title: Y3shot
author: Y3shot
content: We all have a different experience how we started our first bet. Their are people who started bet without having any knowledge concerning it. Their are some people started with a help from a friend to bet and their are some who took their time to learn before they started paying bet. How was your first start? Did you play blindly or spent some time to learn.?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I started with bookmakers, in 2014, EPL. I did not know much about leagues and tournament in football at the time. I registered on a local gambling site, I went to a fiat ATM machine to fund my betting account. I chose four matches with 2 odd included and I won the accumulated bet. That made me thought gambling is easy, not knowing it was the beginning of addiction and losses to come.

comments.author: NicNacCoin
comments.body: I first started gambling in 2017. I shared the first gambling game with a close friend of mine and participated in gambling from there.I was initially blind about this gambling game but with the help of my friend later learned about gambling.At first there was some difficulty but later there was no problem.I have lost many things in my life because of this gambling game. Sometimes I gain more than I lose.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: At first I tried gambling from faucet on the dice game website, then switch to a sportsbook and join this forum. I found a lot of information and big events here, so I felt more comfortable doing gambling activities, of course trying some deposits. I play blindly and learn at the same time, because I want to quickly understand and can play, more precisely I start gambling learning + practice .

comments.author: jakelyson
comments.body: My first online bet was on Plinko. I think it was introduced to me by a friend. I do not remember which gambling site it was but there are free sats or faucets that I used to play the game. I never won any, I always lost. I got disappointed with that game and just stopped it. I do not really lose any money because I used the faucet to get something I can use to bet on it. It was a good past time but sometimes frustrating since I do not really win. Later on, I discovered sports betting and that is when I fall in love with gambling online. I never looked back to casino games anymore. I can easily bet on my favorite teams or sports without even having to get up from my chair. It is very easy and convenient. That is why most people get easily addicted to online gambling.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Y3shot on November 28, 2022, 11:16:55 AMWe all have a different experience how we started our first bet. Their are people who started bet without having any knowledge concerning it. Their are some people started with a help from a friend to bet and their are some who took their time to learn before they started paying bet. How was your first start? Did you play blindly or spent some time to learn.?Yes, no idea about gambling before and I just put money. I forgotten the game that I've played for the first time but I just went with the crowd because they're all on it.The experience of everyone could be that we all made the same mistakes of betting without knowledge but when we lose and then found it as a fun thing, we started to learn about it.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: I saw people talking about gambling and how they were making money from gambling, but I was thinking gambling was illegal so I started listening to them and in that process I got little awareness about gambling but still did not know how gambling was done, I could not gather the courage to do gamble then because of my religion, my religion was against gambling, then later I notice most people from my religion were gambling, so one day I decided to give it a try with no awareness how to choose your team, so it was just trial by error I was doing then, but right now I can bolding say I have good experience on gambling now.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Quote from: Y3shot on November 28, 2022, 11:16:55 AMWe all have a different experience how we started our first bet. Their are people who started bet without having any knowledge concerning it. Their are some people started with a help from a friend to bet and their are some who took their time to learn before they started paying bet. How was your first start? Did you play blindly or spent some time to learn.?I first came across a gambling site and opened an account for which I got some tokens from their platform and the platform had an option to stake tokens and was paid USDT for staking.  I also got some USDT this way but they wouldn't let me withdraw those USDT unless they had a minimum valid bet of $100.  So I started betting there and from there I got to know about gambling and got a bit addicted to it. This is the story of my coming to gambling

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: You do not need to be a rocket scientist to figure out how to gamble... I figured it out by myself, but I think for people betting on Crypto casinos... it might be a bit more complex. They first have to figure out how to buy Crypto currencies and then they have to figure out how to transfer those coins to the casino.  I have added 3 x referrals from Brick n Mortar casino players to my online Crypto gambling site... and it was a mission to show them how to buy Crypto and also how to deposit those coins at the Crypto casino. (Then you need to explain the crypto values to them.. which is even more difficult) - Some of them are just playing with the Fiat values that are provided on this site.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Y3shot on November 28, 2022, 11:16:55 AMWe all have a different experience how we started our first bet. Their are people who started bet without having any knowledge concerning it. Their are some people started with a help from a friend to bet and their are some who took their time to learn before they started paying bet. How was your first start? Did you play blindly or spent some time to learn.?That was a very long time ago it was in my teenage years it's a color game you just have to pick the right color a very popular betting game in every fiesta, unfortunately, I did not have beginner's luck back then I lose my whole week's allowance it was very addictive I become addicted in a color game I even go from another town's fiesta just to bet on the color game.On Online casinos, I don't remember the site but it's a dice game, again I did not have beginner's luck but this time I can control myself because I have matured and my teenage addiction to color games made me realize the bad side of addiction.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Before I start any agenda I have, I try to research whatever I can search on the internet. If it's about gambling, I remember searching for possible strategies. So I stumbled upon the most famous "Martingale strategy" that made me money initially. As we all know, that's not a complete proof strategy, and it can bite you in the butt if you have managed to continue and be greedy with it. Everybody has that experience where it's an "aha" moment, and you lose. So then I just relied now on luck.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Y3shot on November 28, 2022, 11:16:55 AMHow was your first start? Did you play blindly or spent some time to learn.?If you talk about the first time someone was involved in the world of gambling, of course we have our own way of getting involved in gambling.My personal example:I started betting small in lottery and slot bets blindly. That happened before I got to know online gambling sites, after I got to know online crypto gambling sites, of course I learned more about gambling, how to place bets, how to play and all the ways related to these gambling sites, be it slot games, sports, dice, poker and so on.Conclusion: at first I was involved in gambling betting blindly and changing with the learning method as time went on, until now.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: Y3shot on November 28, 2022, 11:16:55 AMWe all have a different experience how we started our first bet. Their are people who started bet without having any knowledge concerning it. Their are some people started with a help from a friend to bet and their are some who took their time to learn before they started paying bet. How was your first start? Did you play blindly or spent some time to learn.?I did not have a hard time learning my first bet on a dice game a friend explained this to me I first played my first attempt on Stake.com, I also fall on this martingale thing by reasoning at first logic tells us that doubling up will recover our losses but was busted because there is no guaranty that your next roll will be in your favor because of the house edge I ended up losing my winning, my first gambling, I experienced my first chasing my loses, it's really a bad experience.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Gambling is common even some people already know how to play and make an initial deposit, I myself didn't do any help to anyone I just tried it myself and did it alone at home without anyone knowing, but it didn't become a blind pig with a lot of money which is deposited but starting with small money to start the initial bet so for me this is an easy thing, I don't even need to learn in the game and I just take my time when all the work is done.Don't play blindly, it's wrong behavior in my opinion, even if you like to play gambling in your bets, you still have to have good control in your finances so you don't lose everything, so the initial escort shouldn't be bad because you lose a lot of money except just having fun.

comments.author: BobK71
comments.body: In my case first betting was the memorable for me. I was betting on a sports betting site in 2011 where I was in some trouble with KYC as i failed to collect at the moment some required documents at that time. But there could be betting without KYC. I often won matches there. I first made a deposit of $100 and built my balance up to $700 within a few days. But when I submitted the required documents and got my KYC approved i started losing matches like that and finally my balance was zero.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: As far as I remember, I did a bet with our local basketball match. It's funny because I don't know who are the players was and I have no idea what are their current standing. It was an absolutely blind bet. I remembered that I did that small bet because my friends was pretty hyped with a certain team and they are betting with each other and I myself don't want to get out of place so I bet by random. I won that bet and all the money that me and my friends won from each other were all spent on our foods as we watch the next game of the night. At the end we all are happy and I guess that's were it started on my journey on betting.

comments.author: Mauser
comments.body: Quote from: Y3shot on November 28, 2022, 11:16:55 AMHow was your first start? Did you play blindly or spent some time to learn.?As a small boy my grandfather used to take me to the store where he always played lottery and would give me 2 scratch cards when we were watching the lottery girl picking the numbers Saturday evening. My parents still hate gambling to this day, but my grandfather taught me a lot about it with out them knowing. Also my first few card games I learned from him. So I was interested in casinos and gambling at a very young age. During high school I had some probability lessons and we did some roulette and blackjack games in class without money of course. As soon as I turned 18 I wanted to visit my first casino with some friends. We did have some strategies for roulette and blackjack, but lost all our money. We left the casino completely broke. I still remember today that on the one roulette table was a red steak of 7 or 8 numbers in a row and I placed a large bet on black only to see red come one more time. For the first time in a casino it was still fun and a great atmosphere.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: I used to follow one of my friends to gambling back then when i have no sound experience in it but the day i make up my mind to have a try was my first loss as well because i place the bet but couldn't win, but ever since that first attempt it has triggered me to consistently gamble with the expectations and hope to win something big seing others winning around me, but unfortunately all attempts in the first month were failed and a waste of money because i don't have the giid experience in gambling and the kind of bet i place but what was over me then wad the desperation for a win by luck.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: My first gambling experience occurred a long time ago, so I cannot quite remember the exact details, but it was as a result of my interest in sports. I had always been a strong lover of Football, Basketball, and Hockey. This interest built the desire to try and predict outcomes on sport matches and then eventually led me to try and test out my permutation skills on some bookie platform. My strong interest in sports was not actually replicated in actual gambling, and I gave upon it soon after, only now playing periodically, out of sheer curiosity on what the outcome would be, and sometimes for fun.- Jay -

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: Was it in real life or online. Well, in real life I started in carnivals like roulette but it by color and you will win prizes like snacks and stuffed toys. Though you won't win money but it is similar to gambling and later on applied it in the real gambling that's why I am already familiar with the casino games, though not all. There are some games like Black jacks and baccarat that I just had discover a months when I started gambling and it actually entertains me and I think I am good at it.
